short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DataXtract is utilized to save business professionals time while sourcing information online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Data-Xtract helps you gather data during your standard searches, stores your data in projects, allows you to build custom templates, and assists you while you navigate through your links/data collected.  This is a great tool for team collaboration, because you are able to share projects/templates across the platform.
